casebody.data:
SARAH VALEAU, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. ROBERT W. SMITH, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Sedgwick and Van Vorst, JJ.

Decided May 16, 1879. Appeal by defendant from judgment and from order *599denying motion for new trial. This case involves only questions of fact. Van Vorst, J.,

wrote for reversal of the judgment, with costs, to abide the event.

Sedgwick, J., concurred.
